Frameworks and Standards
Our Sustainability Report has been prepared in accordance with the accounting 
standards published by the Sustainability Accounting Standards Board (SASB).  
We have also identified the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) 
that we believe best align with our business activities and key priority areas.
